com.tilisty.models

Class TilistyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tilisty.models.AbstractModel
      • com.tilisty.models.TilistyModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObservable

    public class TilistyModel
extends AbstractModel
    Holds all of the models and delegates to each of them. This also holds each of the constants for the frequently used namespaces throughout the application.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Simpson
